entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Bay Roberts
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow or rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow or freezing rain at times mixed with ice pellets changing to rain this afternoon. Fog patches developing this afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northeast 30 gusting to 50 this afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Tuesday 07 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Rain or snow. Low zero.
entry.summary: Rain changing to flurries overnight. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Fog patches dissipating near midnight. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low zero. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Tuesday 07 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries and risk of freezing drizzle. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near zero. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Tuesday 07 March 2023
